definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-upper case character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟转义字符用于表示任意非大写字母的字符。

sentences.english: It's important the table and column are in uppercase, or the query will not work.
sentences.chinese: 表和列都要用大写字母，这很重要，否则查询将无效。

sentences.english: Please complete in BLACK INK using BLOCK CAPITALS, providing as much information as possible.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水笔填写，要求全部用大写字母。

sentences.english: In this dictionary capital letters are used to cross-refer from one word to another.
sentences.chinese: 本词典用大写字母表示查本词时请参考另一词。

sentences.english: A big arrow and a “Who is this? ” in capital letters appear on the monitor.
sentences.chinese: 一个带着大写字母“这是谁”的大箭头出现在屏幕上。

sentences.english: STRING1 shall consist of uppercase LETTERS only.
sentences.chinese: STRING1应当只由大写字母组成。

sentences.english: Palindromes should be reported all in uppercase characters.
sentences.chinese: 全部用大写字母来输出回文。

sentences.english: Write your name in block letters.
sentences.chinese: 请用正楷大写字母写你的名字。

sentences.english: A big arrow and a “Who is this?” in capital letters appear on the monitor.
sentences.chinese: 一个带着大写字母“这是谁”的大箭头出现在屏幕上。

sentences.english: Please use capital letters to fill in the entry card and customs declaration form of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 请用英文大写字母填写美国入境卡和申报单。

sentences.english: Auto-capitalize starts a new sentence with a capital letter.
sentences.chinese: 自动大写功能将使用一个大写字母开始一条新语句。
大写字母表示从右到左的字符。

sentences.english: Our hostname is all capital letters.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主机名称用的都是大写字母。

sentences.english: As you can see that method converted the string to uppercase.
sentences.chinese: 您可以看到，该方法将字符串转换为大写字母。

definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
case sensitive/distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters
